item.description:
Hi, Everybody!

The weather is supposed to be great today - a perfect day for a 3-part Meetup! We'll start the day with a steaming hot cup of coffee and light breakfast at Stonewall Kitchen. Here is the link with the directions:

www.stonewallkitchen.com

Coffee hour will run from 9:30 to approximately 10:30.

From there we will follow each other up to Laudholm Farm in Wells. One of my friends (an experienced AMC hiker) and I will lead a slow paced hike of about 3 - 4 miles lasting about 2 hours or so. This is a really beautiful spot and I have had a lot of requests to do a hike here. Due to all the tourists and traffic in the summer, there is only a limited window of opportunity to hike and enjoy this beautiful wooded setting on the ocean replete with birds and other wildlife! Here is the link to their web page:

www.wellsreserve.org/visit

Click on trail system for details on the trails. Note that they do charge an entrance fee.

Finally, we will be starved after all that hiking and fresh air, so we will conclude with a light lunch at Mike's Clam Shack (think a nice hot bowl of steaming chowder or broiled haddock among many other delights!

Here is the link to the restaurant and menu:

www.mikesclamshack.com

Hopefully you can join us for this great Meetup. As always contact me if you have any questions or need more information on the directions to Stonewall Kitchen.

Randy
RandyS@maine.rr.com
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a silver Subaru Forester about halfway down the length of this very long parking lot. After 9:30 we'll be sitting inside.
item.name: Coffee Hour Social / Hike at Laudholm Farm / Lunch at Mike's Clam Shack!
